title: Patch Rundown

embed.description: Scarizard and Zirene are joined by Meteos and gypsylord to talk about the start of season 2016, the new AP jungling item Runic Echoes, diversity in Keystone Masteries, and some spooky, spooky ghosts. Patch 6.1 notes: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-61-notes

body:
Let's be honest guys. Putting someone that clearly doesn't know about the game is just lame. Ok, you're a designer, but stop defending your mistakes. Meteos raised good points and the guy kept ignoring it and changed the subject in way to favour his points. Lame. 

Now, let me get my {{champion:103}} and {{summoner:4}} out of here :p
